cause.description:
We believe that every male over the age of 14 should apply Gold Bond powder at least once in their lives.Thats why I am here to make sure that happens and we are raising money for every child in Africa, Somolia, India and all other Nether regions and all over world so all might be able to feel the intense NaNa sensation especially ares of high chaff age because when I mean every male over the age of 14 I mean EVERY male.
Sincerly, Paul Massad
1. To help males find there inner happiness
2. Every guy needs to try Gold Bond
3. Experience of a lifetime
cause.mission: Help those young men in need of change in their lives.
cause.name: GOLD BOND
